Name: SuperMemoPlugins 1.9.0.0
Description: A new version for compatibility with SuperMemo UX 1.4.3.x

Name: SuperMemoPlugins 1.8.0.0
Description:
Another release containing:
* new plugin for recording sounds from any dictionary!
* styles for quickly repeating the same format in many items
* many bug fixes
* enhancement of keyboard navigation
* import from legacy SM small improvements

Name: SuperMemoPlugins 1.7.5.0
Description:
Further improvements of import plugin: now you can import any database from legacy SM (MSM, Sm2004, Sm2006)
Experimentally you can also test importing database using additional translation file - using this you should be able to fully import Advanced English database.
Plugin to edit many items at one time (command, lesson and chapter text)
Possibility to navigate among many question and answer media using only keyboard

Also many bugs was fixed, so we strongly recommend you to upgrade your version.

Name: SuperMemoPlugins 1.7.0.0
Description:
First version with ability to import data from older supermemo. Using NodeAsText format you can convert many old databases mostly without any loss.
Also contains new plugin to adding links to items and to editing many items at once.

Name: SuperMemoPlugins 1.6.1.0
Description: New release with new big feature: now you can edit commercial databases, which by default are locked!

Name: SuperMemoPlugins 1.6.0.0
Description:
* First version compatible with 64-bit environment
* Templates for fast item adding
* Bug fixes in plugin for clearing formatting
* Many other small bug fixes

Name: SuperMemoPlugins 1.5.0.4
Description:
New plugin do reverse question and answer
Many fixes for bugs from 1.5.0.0. version

Name: SuperMemoPlugins 1.5.0.0
Description:
New major version with posibilies to easily exchange items between many databases.
Export any items with their structure to new format: SmUxPack
Import items to any database pointing the node, where you want to add new items.

Name: SuperMemoPlugins 1.0.2.0
Description:
New plugins: 
* assigning downloaded sound file as an item answer
* IPA table to easly enter pronunciation symbols

Name: SuperMemoPlugins 1.0.1.2.zip
Description:
New version with a lot of new features:

* Bookmark system
* Quicksearch and incremental search
* Editor extensions
* Navigation commands

Name: SuperMemoPlugins 1.0.0.1.zip
Description:
New version with:
- plugin to download IPA pronunciation from web dictionary
- plugin to play pronunciation from web dictionary

Still alpha - use at your own risk!!!

Name: SuperMemoPlugins 1.0.0.0
Description:
This is the first alpha version - just proof of concept. If you decided to use it remember to backup your SM often.
For instruction refer to ReadMe.txt inside zip.

Name: SuperMemoPlugins 2.0.0.0
Description:
New version with new features:
* auto format function
* new configuration system
* possibility to change/define new dictionaries for pronunciation downloading
* options to adjust IPA table
* fix for templates bug
* many more small bugs fixes

*IMPORTANT*
This is the first version which comes with a new installer.
New version should be installed in a directory called Plugins in the SuperMemo Ux directory (Example: "c:\Program Files\SuperMemo UX\Plugins")
Before installing new version be sure to remove the previous one manually!
